title: [机械]Inventory Drop Chance v1.4.3 —— 死后物品按比率掉落/删除[1.6.2-1.5.2]
author: wolski
txt_content:
本帖最后由 wolski 于 2013-8-12 22:51 编辑 

搞了好几天的MCPC+，终于搞定了..... 顺便搬个小插件放♂松一下......

至于能否完美支持MCPC+，请自行测试！

功能
部分物品有一定几率会在你死后返回你的背包轻量简单支持权限、组别支持多世界支持WorldGuard有黑白名单设定（用于设定某些物品必掉落或某些物品不会掉落）
1.4~1.4.1改动
可设置删除物品比率！既不会掉落，也不会归还给玩家

Version 1.4.1
Removed: Extra group list is not needed any more. It is removed.Added: New check if config is setup correctly.Added: Added automatic version checker. When a new version is available, it will notice players that have 'idc.noticeonupdate.Added: New config option: "doCheckUpdate". If this is true, IDC will inform players when a new version is available.Fixed: .jar file is renamed to 'InventoryDropChance.jar' from 'Inventory Drop Chance.jar'. This will create a new config. Just remove the old map and copy the old config over to the new one.Fixed: PluginManager and other managers can now recognise Inventory Drop Chance.
Version 1.4
Added: Delete percentage. You can tell IDC how much of the inventory should be deleted. (Those items are not dropped nor given back)Added: New messagesAdded: 'check first'  option. You can tell IDC to first delete a part of the inventory and then save a part of it or the other way around.Added: 'DELETE_PERCENTAGE' flag for WorldGuard.Fixed: When a player has 'idc.keepallitems' a new message will be shown.Fixed: Armour is now saved when a player has 'idc.keepallitems'.Fixed: Sometimes a player would not get all his/her items back even though s/he has 100% retain percentage.Cleaned up code


权限
- idc.group.<组名> 拥有此权限的玩家死后会按照设定的掉落比率掉落物品，没有任何相关权限的玩家会丢失所有的物品和经验，同原版MC-idc.keepallitems 拥有此权限的玩家死后会保留所有物品-idc.keepxp 拥有此权限的玩家死后会保留所有经验

指令
无
